366b5(mdo sde): dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag yongs su brjod cing rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
366b6(mdo sde): par gtor te bskor ba yang byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas
366b7(mdo sde): song ngo / / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas/ 'dug pa de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
367a1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
367a2(mdo sde): nyams su blangs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su brjod par bya'o//
367a3(mdo sde): yongs su brjod pa na lha'i bu khyod rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bde zhing 'jigs pa med par yongs su
367a4(mdo sde): brjod pa yin du'i phyir ro/ / mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa de ni kun nAs ldang ba med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su
367a5(mdo sde): brjod pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa de ni/ g.yul thams
367a6(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'das par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa de ni/ zil gyis mi non par yongs su brjod
367a7(mdo sde): pa dang / zhi bar yongs su brjod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med par yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha rnams
367b1(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra bdag gis mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
367b2(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid dga' ba dang / sems dge ba dang / sems sgrib pa med pa dang / sems kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / de bzhin
367b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la byed bzhin du slad kyis kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar gyur cig ces tshig tu smras na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /
367b4(mdo sde): / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ li tsa byi'i bu rtsal rab dang / lha rnam
367b5(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
367b6(mdo sde): pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs
367b7(mdo sde): pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya maN+Da la aSh+Ta nA ma ma ldan na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor
368a1(mdo sde): brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
368a2(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
368a3(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas
368a4(mdo sde): chos ston to/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mo
368a5(mdo sde): gyur te/ de stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
368a6(mdo sde): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas byung ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma zhig 'das na/ gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil
368a7(mdo sde): 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di lan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis
368b1(mdo sde): thos na yang / dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i
368b2(mdo sde): rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i du
368b3(mdo sde): nan kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pa de ltar bstan par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
368b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba
368b5(mdo sde): nizhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so/ / dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying
368b6(mdo sde): brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o/ / re zhig na sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems
368b7(mdo sde): su gyur nas/ re zhig na khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so// de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir nga
369a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ce
369a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te/ khyim bdag dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// des 'khor phur sum tshogs
369a3(mdo sde): pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'khor mang pos lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po
369a4(mdo sde): nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor par 'gyur/ lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa
369a5(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la ri dang rtsig pa rnams kyis sgrib par mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgul yi rang
369a6(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas dge
369a7(mdo sde): slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas/ yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// des ni lci ba slar bsres pa'i/
369b1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// sems can kun dang thun mong du// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang // gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' nya
369b2(mdo sde): thos dang / / rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa// de dag rnams la yongs su sngo// de nas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste// 'jig rten
369b3(mdo sde): dbang dang byams pa dang / / thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang // kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang // gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang //
369b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang // de bzhin sa yi snying po ste// de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o// khyim bdag 'di ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
369b5(mdo sde): grangs yin te/ 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du thos so// khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig/
369b6(mdo sde): kun nas skal ba mthun pa yi// 'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des// dkyil 'khor brgyad ni bya bar bya// gang zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag
369b7(mdo sde): po dang / / lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang // blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzangs 'dod// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyad bya// seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di rje
370a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
370a2(mdo sde): pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ / seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba
370a3(mdo sde): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to// ngas
370a4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu rmo 'di kun tu bstan te// bsgoms so//
370a5(mdo sde): mang du byas so// rigs kyi bu gang gis na nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
370a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag
370a7(mdo sde): dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor
370b1(mdo sde): brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde/
370b2(mdo sde): la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mr-i ta war+Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
370b3(mdo sde): baphags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gci
370b4(mdo sde): naHbcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'odra ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa nu/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te
370b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thubs cig go/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes
370b6(mdo sde): bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzor nas/

371a1(mdo sde): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
371a2(mdo sde): rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rtag tu skabs phyes/ byams pa khyod ci dang ci
371a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de sa
371a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
371a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bgyid pa
371a6(mdo sde): ma lags pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du tshe ring du skyong bar bgyid pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
371a7(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams
371b1(mdo sde): pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang
371b2(mdo sde): bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/ / de'i phyir byams pa khyod legs par

371b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong

372a1(mdo sde): dang / btang snyoms chen po sgoms pa dang / rgyun mi 'chud par mchod rten rnying pa gsos pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad byang chub kyi
372a2(mdo sde): sems la mos par bya ba ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi
372a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang
372a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos lnga bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag

375b6(mdo sde): shing rin char byos shig/ so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no// tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so// mi dbul po las ni//

376a1(mdo sde): ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do// 'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dka'/ dag
376a2(mdo sde): sems ni g.yo dka' bas na/ kha na ma tho ba las brnyas te med snyam du byas na/ chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi/ rgyun gyis na snod chen po gang ngo // yud tsam gyi bar bar du sdig byas
376a3(mdo sde): pas na/ bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo // re zhig mi'i lus stor na/ bskal pa khri'i bar du yang skyur mi'i lus mi thob bo// dUr ba'i tshe mi sdong ngo //
376a4(mdo sde): dper na ni rta brgyugs pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/ dpa' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ring gson mod kyi/ sang gi gnya' yang dka' bo// da dus kho na la bab
376a5(mdo sde): kyis/ mang po'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so// bag byas la le lo bla khyang dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing / rang nyams
376a6(mdo sde): kyis yid mi bya'o/ / mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la/ rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la/ phyal pa don med pa la/ nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab
376a7(mdo sde): tu 'gyod pa mthar ci'ang thob pa med par mi bya'o/ / mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
376b1(mdo sde): kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gang+gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste/ de'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do// snga ma 'das pa'i sangs
376b2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do/ / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin bachad do// ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro// dus gsum
376b3(mdo sde): gyi byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro// ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na/ nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod

376b5(mdo sde): kyi khams na/ gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng nas/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sang rgyal sbran te/
376b6(mdo sde): nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su bzung la deng zhig/ yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas/ sems can thams cad la
376b7(mdo sde): mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod do/ / khyed la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig/ de nas me tog stong gi thog gi
377a1(mdo sde): @#sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad+mo'i snod kyi khams na/ lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/ so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te
377a2(mdo sde): phyir nur nas/ lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/ 'od kun gyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste/ cig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ ser po/ dam/
377a3(mdo sde): po dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas/ yan chud sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa yang khong du chud nas/ so sor pad+ma'i snod kyi khams kyi
377a4(mdo sde): nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyi skal ba stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas/ me tog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du
377a5(mdo sde): phyin nas/ rang bzhin gyi skal ba me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdun dang / 'od shin tu bzang ba'i khang par 'dug nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos rgya ma
377a6(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa bshad do/ / de nas yang seng ge'i khri las langs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas/ gral bcu'i chos bshad do// de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin
377a7(mdo sde): te las su bya ba bcu bshad do/ / de nas yang khri las langs te/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas/ phyogs shing lta ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas lang+ga
377b1(mdo sde): te'aphrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas/ bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ gnam bden gnam du phyin nas/ sa bcu'i chos
377b2(mdo sde): bshad do/ / de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas/ rdo rje bcu bshad do// de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas/ bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad do//
377b3(mdo sde): de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas/ smon lam bcu bshad do// de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho
377b4(mdo sde): brang du phyin te/ nga'i thog ma phyi mo'i pad+mo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad do//
377b5(mdo sde): gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te/ gnyis su med do// tha dad pa yang med do// bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad
377b6(mdo sde): do de'i tshwa shAkya thub pa pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas/ lding ba'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas/ bdud kyis chos gnos pa bzhin du bshar zin nas
377b7(mdo sde): yas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka phye lar skyes nas/ yum gyi mtshan ni lha mdzes chen mo/ yab kyi mtshan ni zas gtsang ma/ nga bdag gi ming ni si tar zhes bya ste/ lo bdun na
378a1(mdo sde): rab tu byung / lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas/ nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas/
378a2(mdo sde): dbang ba'i chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po// dra
378a3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir/ grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na/ khams gcig nas gcig so so'i mi mthun te/ tha dad pa'i grangs med
378a4(mdo sde): do/ sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// ngas khams 'dir lan brgyad stong phyin te/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste/ dbang po chen
378a5(mdo sde): po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho bral du phyin nas/ de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo phye'o// de nas gnas kyi pho brang nas mar babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang chub
378a6(mdo sde): kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi mo rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang bshad do//
378a7(mdo sde): sems thog ma g.yos pa ni/ rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go// rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims gcig ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no// byang chub
378b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ thog ma phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no// sen can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal ba yod do// thams cad kyi shes pa
378b2(mdo sde): dang / kha dog dang / sems dang / yid dang / sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod
378b3(mdo sde): nams yod do/ / rtag par yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do// so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas/ chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus
378b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to/ / ngas da mang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do// rdzogs long
378b5(mdo sde): spyod par bdag ste/ / pad+mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas// mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi stang // shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs// me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya/
378b6(mdo sde): khoms de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/ kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son// de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong // rdzogs longs spyod
378b7(mdo sde): pa rang bzhin lus/ / sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po// kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren// cig car nga yi gnas su 'ongs// sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon// zil
379a1(mdo sde): @dang sgo mo de nas bye/ / zung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong ngo // slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin// kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// nga yi mkhan po tshul
379a2(mdo sde): khrims kha ton lcogs/ tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad// tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin// gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran
379a3(mdo sde): bzhin/ / 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub// gdod ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis bklags// ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton bklags// byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa//
379a4(mdo sde): klaglad la khyer zhing khrims gzung bzhin// thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston// nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod// so sor thar pa shes
379a5(mdo sde): rab bzhin/ / mang po yid kun brtag par ches// khyed rnams spangs rgyas phyin pa 'ong // nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang // rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed// tshul
379a6(mdo sde): khrims le'u kun chog tshang yin/ / yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu// sems can sangs rgyas khrims nod pa// de nas sangs rgyas
379a7(mdo sde): sa ru phyin/ / tshor chen sa dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang po kun gyis gus par byas// sems gcig brtul te ngaklog nyon// de'i tshe na shAkya thub
379b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas/ thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs/ bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dun pa ni/ pha ma dang
379b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang / yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o// sr-i zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'gal ba ni/ chos zab mor thub pa'i gzhung ste/ sri zhu
379b3(mdo sde): ming ni tshul khrims so/ / ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang / gtong ba'o// de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo // de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub
379b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas rim pa drug gi ming dang / rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ sa
379b5(mdo sde): gcig tu mnyan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po bklags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas
379b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go/ khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig/ sems g.yo
379b7(mdo sde): phyogs pa bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / rdo rje bcu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kha ton du lhogs shig/ 'ong ni tshul khrims kyi 'od kho nas
380a1(mdo sde): byung ste/ rgyu yod rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang / dmar po/ ser po/ dkar po/ nag po'ang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems
380a2(mdo sde): kyang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
380a3(mdo sde): ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na/ mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzung ba'i rig
380a4(mdo sde): so/ legs par bslabs pa'i rigs so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams rtag par nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nor na ni rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po che phra da/
380a5(mdo sde): dge slong pho mos dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang / gdol pa dang / nyid grub dang / pho g.yang dang / mo g.yang dang
380a6(mdo sde): bran pho mos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag brnyan dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i mi la sogs te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig mda' phrad pa'i rnams tham
380a7(mdo sde): cad tshul khrims mnor du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor thar pa
380b1(mdo sde): phas pham pa bcu yod do/ / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton du ma bklags na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin
380b2(mdo sde): nga'ang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go/ / lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang
380b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis/ bslab cing gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi
380b4(mdo sde): bu rnams la bka' sprul pa/ bdag gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa la sdod pa// gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa// sngags
380b5(mdo sde): dang rngad mo byas te bsad pa/ gsod pa'i rgyu/ gsod pa'i rkyen/ gsod pa'i chos byed pa gsod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te/ sems yod do cog la rmed kar gsod du
380b6(mdo sde): mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te/ bags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mangs
380b7(mdo sde): dang rtsa 'or pa bya ba'i rigs so/ / bdag gis rang nyams byas te/ snying tshim par sems can bsad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag
381a1(mdo sde): gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha logs po ma byin par len du badrug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/ ma byin par len pa'i rgyu/ ma byin par len
381a2(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyer ba la sogs te// lha ma srin dang / bdag po yod pa dang / yang glo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzas so cog la khab
381a3(mdo sde): dang rtswa nyag ma gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangs su mi rung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing
381a4(mdo sde): snying rje bar byas te/ rtag par sems can no cog gi yon tan dang / bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so// de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na/ byang chub sems
381a5(mdo sde): dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan yang mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nas/ bud med do cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang / gzhan
381a6(mdo sde): la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang
381a7(mdo sde): byol song dang / lho dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo la mi rmongs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'ogal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sem
381b1(mdo sde): can thams cad thar pa'i ra mda' bya zhing / chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so// de la smrar mi 'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/ byol song dang / ma dang /
381b2(mdo sde): mo dang / sring mo la sogs te/ gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/ byams shing snying rje ba med na/ de ni byang chub semasad dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas
381b3(mdo sde): kyi bu bdag gis brdzun byas sam/ pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / brdzun
381b4(mdo sde): gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer/ ma mthong ba la ni mthong zhes zer/ lus dang sems kyis brdzun byas pa dang / byang chub
381b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing / gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang /
381b6(mdo sde): yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i las byed par bskyed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu spyo ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/ pha logs po
381b7(mdo sde): smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ spro ba'i khu ba 'tshong
382a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/ smyo ba'i khu ba'o cog 'tshong du mi rung / smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o//
382a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la snang zhing / thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed
382a3(mdo sde): nabyang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa
382a4(mdo sde): bdag gis 'phyas su byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan tama?/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na/
382a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi/ sangs rgyas kyi rno kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying
382a6(mdo sde): rje bskyed de/ ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslabs pa'i rigs na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos
382a7(mdo sde): la nyes zhes bshad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag bstod cing / phar smod pa dang / gzhan la bdag bstod
382b1(mdo sde): bar spyod par ston pa/ smod pa'i rgyu/ smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/ smong ba'i chos dang / smod pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par smra
382b2(mdo sde): dbab cing / ngan sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te/ dge zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na/ la la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni bsnyad/ gzhan gyi legs pa ni
382b3(mdo sde): bcabs te/ gzhan la smad/ smra bab par byas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che 'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/
382b4(mdo sde): ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna che ba'i rkyen byed dam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs so cog dang / gzhan ci 'dod
382b5(mdo sde): pa bzhin dgongs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing / sems la gshe ba dang / dong tse gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/
382b6(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na/ tshig gcig le'u gcig rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bsha da la/ slar ngag ngan pas spyos te smra ba ba na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o//
382b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi pha logs po khro bar ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems
383a1(mdo sde): @dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la/ rtag par snying rje skyed cing / bya ba'i rigs kyi phyir log par/
383a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nang na/ sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas 'tshog pa dang / ral gri dang dbyig pas gdab cing / brdegs kyang snying brtse ma bris te/
383a3(mdo sde): pha logs po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing / gnong bar yang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig
383a4(mdo sde): gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i
383a5(mdo sde): chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi nang tshig gcig/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad la yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong thos
383a6(mdo sde): na mdung rtse gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems
383a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing / ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// dge zhugs spyod pa'i rnams
383b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigs so/ / 'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na/ tshul khrims bcu tshang bar zhig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
383b2(mdo sde): la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na/ da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las la ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal
383b3(mdo sde): po'i gral yang ster/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs bcu dong / bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa
383b4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa/ yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas/ ngan song gsum du lhung ste/ bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mchog
383b5(mdo sde): gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na gcig kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo // khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i
383b6(mdo sde): rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te/ rtag par gzungs sus zung ba'i rigs so// gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri'i nang nas rgya cher bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis
383b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang 'khor lo
384a1(mdo sde): bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nod pa'i rigs so// 'ung tang lha ma srin
384a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang / rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang skyabs byed do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so// tshul khrims thob zin na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i
384a3(mdo sde): sems dang / sems la gus par bya ba'i sems pa bskyed de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang / mtshun
384a4(mdo sde): par mthong ba dang / las mthun par byed pa mthong na langs te/ bsu la phyag 'tshal te nad dri ba'i rigs so// byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems
384a5(mdo sde): dang glen pa'i sems bskyed de/ ma langs ma ba su phyag ma byas te/ rtsi la'ang chos bzhin du rjes dang / ri mo dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang / phos mo sa dang /
384a6(mdo sde): nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la/ dgos so cog ma sbyar te/ de ltar na nus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched kar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes
384a7(mdo sde): tedage ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor ro/ / la la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang / lag gis chang snod blangs te/ mi pha rol po la byin te blud na/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'o
384b1(mdo sde): bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'o cog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo /
384b2(mdo sde): bdag rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag ched kar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po la bdar ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sha ched kar zos pa dang / sha'o cog
384b3(mdo sde): bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 'jigs nas spong ngo // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
384b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung ngo / / shwa zos pa ni sdig grangs med do// sha zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo // sgog pa dang / btsong dang
384b5(mdo sde): rgya sgog dang / ri sgog rnams dang / shing kun dang / 'di rnam lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo // la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems
384b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang / tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam bzhi bshig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrim
384b7(mdo sde): bshig pa sdig byed pa mthong na/ mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so// de las byang chub sems dpa' ma bstan te/ mthol tshangs byed ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug
385a1(mdo sde): 'dug cing / tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe/ sdig dngos su byung gis/ nyes pa mthol tshangs
385a2(mdo sde): byed du chug cig/ ma bcug na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba/ lhan cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar du'ong
385a3(mdo sde): pa mthong na/ rgyang grags stong gi lam na tshur 'ongs na ni bsu/ 'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya/ nyi ma
385a4(mdo sde): gcig gi zan du gser srung gsum gyi kha zas dang / khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te/ byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ dus
385a5(mdo sde): gsum du chos bshad de/ nyin gcig rtsing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la/ khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so// chos kyi phyir lus dang
385a6(mdo sde): bsngos te chos gsol lo/ / de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang mdo sngo 'chad pa'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'chad pa
385a7(mdo sde): yod na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la/ gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so// la la
385b1(mdo sde): zhig ri dang / tshal dang / shing gi drung dang / dge 'dun gyi sa dang / khyim gyi nang dang / chos 'chad do cog gi sar phyin par byas te/ mnyan cing 'dod do// de'i gnas su song ste
385b2(mdo sde): ma mnyan ma mnos na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu sems ni theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims la 'dug kyang / khar smra na sangs
385b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing / log par lta ba 'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzung
385b4(mdo sde): su bzung na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab bo cog rtag par rim gro byas te/ gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na/ dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa
385b5(mdo sde): brgyad kyi nang na/ nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o// pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma dang / dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gI btab cing
385b6(mdo sde): nyon mo dA na/ kun kyang gswo te sos par bya'o// de la byang chub semA dpa' semA can la lta gshe zhing / ngan sem kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/ g.ye dang / ri lung dang / mkhar dang / tshal na nad pa 'dug
385b7(mdo sde): pa mthong ste mdab dang rim gro ma bya na ltung ba'o/ / sadr-i r+g+ha kyi bu ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / sta re la sogs te 'thab mo'i spyad/ mtshon cha dang / sem can gsod pa'i spyang dang 'dra ba rgya n+ya mo la so zla pa nang du mi
386a1(mdo sde): rung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis gsod kyang sha mi blan na/ sems can thams cad gsod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha chad
386a2(mdo sde): 'chang ba na ltung ba'o/ / 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam bcu ni bslabs te/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// 'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad do// sangs
386a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/ nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'grul ba dmag gi g.yul bshams
386a4(mdo sde): ta dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te/ sems can mang po bsad na/ byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing / phan tshun du 'grul yang mi rung na/ cheng kar g.yul
386a5(mdo sde): gyi dgra byed pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran phos mos dang / phyugs dag sna drug dang / gshin sgrom
386a6(mdo sde): gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na/ gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o//
386a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de/ pa logs po dge ba des pa/ chos kyi mkhan po/ dge 'dun rgyal po/ ya rabs btsun pa la mnyes par log pa bdun dang / phas
386b1(mdo sde): pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / bu pho nu bo dang / gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig go zhes bskur na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la
386b2(mdo sde): slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su lhung na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ ched kar me chen po btang la/ ri dang tshal/ g.ye dang ri lung dang
386b3(mdo sde): dbyar zla rab man chad/ ston zla tha chung yan bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / zhing dang
386b4(mdo sde): skyed zhing dang / lha ma srin dang / bla'i 'khor la sogs te/ bdag po yod do cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi rung ngo // la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas
386b5(mdo sde): kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma/ bdag dang / mur 'dug dang / gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang / ci'ang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims
386b6(mdo sde): nod cing / gzungs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so// gzhung dang lugs shes shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang
386b7(mdo sde): rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go rims dang / chos kyi cho ga shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la/
387a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang zhe sdang bskyed de/ gzhan nyan thos theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log
387a2(mdo sde): par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas/ rgya cher phye nas
387a3(mdo sde): gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi lam nas/ theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na/ chos kyi
387a4(mdo sde): phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so/ / dka' thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/ lag drar bsregs pa/ ser mo bsregs pa'o// de la lus dang / lag
387a5(mdo sde): ngar dang / sor mo bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/ de rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// stag dang / spyang ki dang / seng ge ltogs
387a6(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa dang / 'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang / rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/ byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i
387a7(mdo sde): chos bshad de sems ni phye/ yid ni gol bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir// lan blan pa'i rigs pa ni ma blan gyi/ yi ge dang / tshul khrims/
387b1(mdo sde): ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas/ snga phyi med par dkon mchog la 'phya zhing drachad pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khe dang
387b2(mdo sde): mi sbran pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong ya/ btsan ngag gis bsdigs te/ nan gyis nor
387b3(mdo sde): dang khe tshol lo cog gi ming ni ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o/ / gzhan la'ang snying rje med cing / sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
387b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob na/ nyin gcig cing dus drug tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung / de'i gzhung dang don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o// byang
387b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par/ sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni/ bdag la brnyas shing bslus/ gzhan la'ang brnyas te/ chos so/
387b6(mdo sde): cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par/ gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na
387b7(mdo sde): pog snod khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la/ mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis rab tu dpar bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i mi la brnyes ma shin byed cing / ngan mi byed pa med do/
388a1(mdo sde): zhes bskur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de/ ci'ang mi gsod par btang ba'i las byed cing / pho bo cog na
388a2(mdo sde): bdag gi pha yin/ mo 'o cog ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gang skyes cog na yang / de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag
388a3(mdo sde): gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos na/ bdag gi pha ma bsad // gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do// sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no// me dang
388a4(mdo sde): rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas/ rtag par gson par btang ba'i las byed/ gar skyes par skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de/ bdag gis 'or ba
388a5(mdo sde): dngar mda' byas te/ nyon mongs shing 'phongs pa thar pa'o// rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad de bstan bslabs nas/ sems can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o//
388a6(mdo sde): pha ma dang / bu po dang / nu bo zhig shi na/ de'i nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na/ de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas rngam
388a7(mdo sde): cad dang phrad de/ mtho ris su skye'o// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// / chos kyi rgya mo/ bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'di lta ste/ tshul
388b1(mdo sde): khrims 'di bcu bslabs na/ sems gus par gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang / tshul khrims gcig pu gcig pa nas rgya che zhing gsal bar
388b2(mdo sde): bshad do/ / sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ khros pa'i lan khros pas mi bla na/ brdegs pa'i lan brdegs pas mi bla na/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo gnyen rnam
388b3(mdo sde): drug bsad kyang sha blan du mi rung ngo / / gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha blan du mi rung ngo // srog bcad de sha glon na sri zhu'i chos dang 'gal lo// bran pho mo la ngag ngan
388b4(mdo sde): pas spyos shing brdegs la nyin gcig ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la'ang sdig grangs med na/ ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub
388b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha blan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste ci'ang mi shes par/ bdag
388b6(mdo sde): dbang po rno la mdzangs pa rlom zhing / la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyugs btsan pa bsnyems te/ la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang
388b7(mdo sde): nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas/ rgyags dregs sngan chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang / tshul khrims mi gsol mi nod/ chos kyi mkhan po la la ni rung chung
389a1(mdo sde): la la ni na gzhon/ la la ni thabs chung / la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po mtshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod de/ chos kyi yi ge dang tshul khrims so/
389a2(mdo sde): cog zad par shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo// chos kyi slob dpon ma rigs pa dang / thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing / chos kyi mkhan po la yang dag
389a3(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa'i gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing / don du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na/ sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing
389a4(mdo sde): 'dun na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshang byas la/ ltas
389a5(mdo sde): bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo/ / ltas bzang po ma mthong na ni/ zhag bdun gnyis/ bdun gsum/ lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis bzung ngo //
389a6(mdo sde): ltas bzang po mthong nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do// lhas bzang po ma mthong na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
389a7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnos kyang / ming tshul khrims thob bo zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na/
389b1(mdo sde): ltas bzang po mi dgos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na/ ltas bzang po mi dgos te/ chos kyi mkhan po de'i dun du tshul khrims ma
389b2(mdo sde): na tshul khrims kyang thob ste/ gus pa'i sems skye'o// rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
389b3(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na/ ltas bzang po mthong bar dgos so// chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig/ bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / rgyal po
389b4(mdo sde): dang rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams byams shing / mdza' ba bsnyems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa/ chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir
389b5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis/ gcig pu gcig pu nas/ 'dri ba'i lan ma blun na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs
389b6(mdo sde): rgyurgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang ba'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod
389b7(mdo sde): sgom mi nus pa rnams ni/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par ltas te/ theg pa chung ngu pa rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi gzhu nga la
390a1(mdo sde): bsten pa dang / a bi la dar ma bshad pa/ slob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chud
390a2(mdo sde): pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no// de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin//
390a3(mdo sde): chos 'chad pa bdag po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag
390a4(mdo sde): po dang / de lta bu byed na/ byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ mi mdza' ste 'thab cing rtsod pa'ang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs te/
390a5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs par mi spyad/ bdag gis bdag gi skor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o// de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog
390a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong 'gron pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang
390a7(mdo sde): khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni bsu
390b1(mdo sde): 'gro na ni bskyal te/ zas kyi bsti stang dang / khang khyim dang / nyal ba'i mal cha dang / khri dang / sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no// la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gi lus
390b2(mdo sde): dang bu pho dang / bu mo dang / btsongs te ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos te/ sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te dge 'dun pa la dang / dge 'dun gyi 'gron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi
390b3(mdo sde): nor skal ba yod pa'i sa ra/ dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag pos dge 'dun 'gron pa rnams rims kyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas/ bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer
390b4(mdo sde): bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'gron pa ma btang na/ dge 'dun gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste/ byol song dang mtshungs so// dge sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i rigs kyis
390b5(mdo sde): bon yang ma yin te/ de ltar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang go rims su ma bab par/ logs shig tu yon blangs shing / bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo // de lta bu'i yon gyi
390b6(mdo sde): nor rdzas ni/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na/ bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs
390b7(mdo sde): rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nang pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba
391a1(mdo sde): dang rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gi dge 'dun gnyer te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du srong na/ dge bskos la dris te/
391a2(mdo sde): de rang go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na/ phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun thob bo// gud nas dgro bcom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas
391a3(mdo sde): go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o/ / de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni/ mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so// sangs rgyas bdun la
391a4(mdo sde): ni gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do/ / sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas/ gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems spyad de/ gso ba'i khe'i phyir/
391a5(mdo sde): phos mos kyi g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang / bdag rdung ba/ bdug 'du ba/ phos mos kyi mtshan lta mi lam bzang ngan 'gro la bo zhes zer/ mo zhes zer
391a6(mdo sde): log pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la/ dug rtsi rnam pa brgyad stong byed de sbrul drug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug
391a7(mdo sde): dang byad stems la sogs pa snying rje yod med pa lta bu/ ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus kyi dkon mchog gsum la skur pa byas te/
391b1(mdo sde): gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/ kha ni stong pa 'chang/ las ni yod pa'i las byed/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i smyan byed cing / mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ ci la
391b2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs shing chags pa med/ dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe/ sems can gsod/ rkun po dang chom
391b3(mdo sde): po byed kying / mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// khrims bzung ba'i le'u'i rang
391b4(mdo sde): nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do/ / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na/ ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa
391b5(mdo sde): cog dang / rkun po chen po sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ga 'tsheng ba mthong ngam/ dge slong
391b6(mdo sde): dang dge slong ma 'tshong ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas/ bran po bran mor

392a4(mdo sde): la dang / sel byi dang / khyi dang / phag dang / bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo // de lta bu che kar gson ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de phos mo sa la sogs
392a5(mdo sde): pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang / dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo // yang gcig tu dung bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / gyi ma shir dang / jeng dang / gling
392a6(mdo sde): bu dang / kong hi'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo // cho rje dang / mig mangs dang / bar rtsig gi rtsed mo dang / ra 'dri lug dmag gi rtsed mo dang
392a7(mdo sde): po long rdob pa dang / rdo 'phrin gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la bde bu 'phen pa dang / khras byed pa dang / me long 'brud pa byar mi rung ngo // rtsa ci tsha'u dang / rgya cang dang phor bu kha

393a1(mdo sde): sogs pa bdag bye zhing shes la/ chos bzhin du las byed par ston to// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bzung la/ sran thub par bya ba ni bskyed cing gsogs

393b1(mdo sde): cad mi za bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di me chen pos bsregs/ lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bskal kyang tshul

397b1(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so// de bas na tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos/ chos 'di'i nang nas kyang / gcig nasku gcig nas khrel ma mkhan po bya'o//
397b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang ba dang / lci ba dang / yin pa dang / ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na/ gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin
